page.title: 19Swim Training.
page.content:
My name is Antony Nannini and I am 12 years old.I am a member of Orpington Swimming Club.
My training sessions are held on Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday and Sunday.The sessions on Monday to Thursday are an hour and a half,but on Sunday they are for two hours.
On a typical evening,we start with an 800m warm up.This is followed by a "Main course"of around 2,000m,which may be broken to include practice in all four strokes.When this is finished,we do turns or kicking and then a final 1,000m,but this is split into several shorter swims.At the end of the session we do sprints of one length or relays. ***********
